item.title: Eternal thought--Chapter 107 Tianlei Lotion
item.description: When he returned to Xiangyun mountain, Bai Xiaochun was sad. He didn’t dare to continue to test many strange pills left in his storage bag. Especially when he was walking on the road of Xiangyun mountain, all Xiangyun mountain disciples, when they saw themselves, were either eccentric or fierce, and they were angry. “It’s so hard to stick to the great ideal It’s not my fault. Uncle Li asked me to study it myself… " Bai Xiaochun sighed, trotted all the way back to the cave, sat there, looking at the distant sky in a daze.

The man was caught off guard and almost caught his face. Fortunately, he responded quickly, and he tilted his head back, hiding from it when he could not let it go. Zhang Xiaofan was taken aback, quickly stopped Xiaohui, and turned to look at the man.

item.description: I saw at the edge of the Bishuitan, the water beast that had been sleeping fast, suddenly woke up, turned around fiercely, his huge eyes showed endless fierce light, the hair roots on his back were raised, and a blood basin was opened. Big mouth, showing two long sharp fangs, actually put on an attacking gesture. And its goal is the disciples of Qingyunmen standing on the steps. This water unicorn is a wilderness spirit, an ancient beast, this power, I suddenly saw the change of wind and clouds, the blue sky had darkened in an instant, and as it took the first step to the steps, it was originally calm.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 18 meeting
item.description: Song Daren froze for a moment, the sound lingered in his ears, just like fairy music. After a while, he woke up like a dream and turned around like lightning, only to see five or six female disciples standing behind him. In the Qingyun Gate, under the door of Xiaozhufeng who always only accepted female disciples. The first to face them was a beautiful woman with a melon seed face, her hair like clouds, her skin like snow, and a faint smile on the corner of her mouth.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 17 going to the meeting
item.description: This morning, everyone on the Dazhu Peak of Qingyunmen was in high spirits, especially the disciples, all smiling, although there was no lack of tension, but most of them were submerged in excitement. Among all the people, only the master brother Song Daren and the second son Wu Dayi, the third son Zheng Dali, the fourth elder He Dazhi, and the old Wu Lu Daxin and the sixth elder Du Bishu were all not easy.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 16 drive
item.description: “Wang Wang Wang”! “Squeak”! … The bark of the dog is intertwined with the scream of the monkey, echoing on the Dazhu Peak of Qingyun Mountain, breaking the tranquility here. Holding the black burning stick in his hand, Zhang Xiaofan rushed out of the kitchen door and was furious: “Dead dog! Dead monkey! Don’t run! The monkey jumped on the back of the big yellow dog with a swish, and the already-running rhubarb spread out on all four feet and ran, Zhang Xiaofan couldn’t catch up, watching Xiao gray making a face, and put a fragrant meat bone on the rhubarb.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 12 Reunion
item.description: After returning from Yougu, another half a month later, Zhang Xiaofan had been in Qingyunmen for three full years, and also ended his bamboo cutting career, but at the end of the time he handed over the results, even blushing for himself. Because of that inexplicable trip to the valley, Zhang Xiaofan often felt dizzy, lack of energy and lack of blood in the next half month, and the whole person was particularly tired.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 11 Changes
item.description: Zhang Xiaofan looked at the bead for a long while, and his breathing gradually calmed down, but apart from seeing the difference in color brightness, the others did not see anything, and had to put it back on his chest again. He looked at Tian Ling’er next to him and saw that she was still unconscious, but her face was getting bloodied, and the situation was much better. He picked up the amber Zhu Ling and took a closer look.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 10 The Valley
item.description: Zhang Xiaofan came up to the mountain and came to the familiar bamboo forest, but he saw the mountains full of verdant mountains, cascading layers, mountain breezes passing by, the bamboo sea undulating, like the waves of the sea, extremely magnificent, and his heart suddenly widened. He took a deep breath of fresh air in the mountains, moved around, and walked into the bamboo forest with a hatchet. The place he went to at this time was different from when he came three years ago.

item.description: Song Daren was a teacher at first. item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 6 Apprenticeship
item.description: Zhang Xiaofan woke up wandering for a long while, slowly sat up, and the past was like a tide, and his heart surged for a moment. A nightmare! “You wake up, that’s fine.” A voice came from the door and walked in. Zhang Xiaofan looked up and recognized Song Daren, who had been seen on Tongtian Peak at the time, tall and rude. In his current state of mind, somehow, seeing this acquaintance is somewhat kind.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 5 Getting Started
item.description: At this time, everyone in the hall was talking, as if talking about something. The young priest who led Zhang Xiaofan and Lin Jingyu came to the front of the door in a robe, and said in courtesy: “Master, fellow uncles, disciples often arrows, ordered two young…” He didn’t finish his words. Suddenly above the sacred and solemn hall, a shouting cry broke out, interrupting him: “Ghost, evil spirit! Ghost!…”

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 4 Shock Change
item.description: In the early morning, the rain finally stopped. The water droplets on the tree were crystal clear, slipped quietly from the edge of the leaf, and fell down. Because of the wind, it crossed the beautiful arc in the air and hit Zhang Xiaofan’s face. The cold coolness awakened Zhang Xiaofan from his dream. He opened his eyes and subconsciously shouted, “Master…” But there is no one in Shiye, only Lin Jingyu is lying beside him.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 3 Vision
item.description: In Zhang Xiaofan’s eyes, the clouds in the sky, whether it is white clouds or dark clouds, have never seen as close to the ground as the black clouds tonight, the thunder has never been so deafening, the lightning has never been so dazzling, almost making it difficult for him Look straight. It seems that this day is about to fall. He stood there staring blankly, watching the men in black and the old monk in the grass temple glaring at each other as a way of fighting.
